#summary Possible upcoming chapters

Here are some sections I'd like to add, as time allows:

 * Exposing functionality to 3rd parties via REST APIs 
  * requiring OpenID authentication, API keys...
  * API bestpractices (presentations; versioning, paging, filtering, DOS attacks)
  * microformats
 * Working with REST APIs from GWT 
 * Managing locations (with REST APIs)
 * Minimizing code duplication for entities CRUD
 * [LandingEnhancements autocompletion, i18n]
 * [CommunicationEnhancements Client-server communication enhancements]

Nice to haves
 * Managing theaters and preferences 
  * get language from OpenID
 * Generating RSS Atom feeds
 * Analytics
  * defining key metrics, monitoring workflows, A-B testing
 * Offering support for users
 * Enabling offline usage
 * Scheduling tasks, sending email
 * Integration with social networks 
  * Google & FB places, twitter, FB events
 * Allowing public to browse our data
 * Making reservations
 * Charging money
  * Google checkout ([http://aralbalkan.com/1504 not supported on AppEngine by default]), Paypal?
 * Enhanced multi-device support
  * native vs web app
 * Developing Flex clients with Spring Roo (depends on [https://jira.springsource.org/browse/ROOFLEX-19 bug])
